text: innum, ovvoru camukattilum a(nta camukatta)varkalilirunte avarkalukku etircatciyai avarkalukku etiraka, eluppi annalil, um'mai ivarkalukku (um'mai nirakarikka murpatum im'makkalukku) etirakac catciyaka nam kontu varuvom; melum, ivvetattai ovvoru porulaiyum telivakkukiratakavum, nervali kattiyatakavum, rahmattakavum, muslimkalukku nanmarayamakavum um'mitu nam irakki vaittirukkirom
